product_name: Tecnu Extreme Medicated Poison Ivy Scrub - 4 oz.
long_description: Tecnu Extreme(R) takes treating symptoms of poison oak and ivy to the next level! Scrub removes the plant's harmful oil, while the active ingredient (Grindelia Robusta) provides relief from itching and burning. Homeopathic formula provides one step relief-simply wash infected area for 15 seconds and rinse. Can also be used for treatment of poison ivy and sumac.
short_description: Tecnu Extreme(R) takes treating symptoms of poison oak and ivy to the next level!
